name: Journey to the Roots (Zeranow)
description:
Hello guyss, This is my first project here. This is a demo made for the Global Game Jam 2023.  The overall theme this year was "Root" and this is our representation of the theme!

The game is a 2D platformer, with the possibility to switch camera from sidescroller to top down.

I wanna say a big thanks to all the team,  for their passion, hard work,  throughout this week. Your experience and teamwork made this experience unforgettable.
